programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Reunion Special" - All of the designers get to meet with each other one more time to talk about their experiences while on Project Runway Season 11. The designers seize the opportunity to celebrate the winner and iron out any issues that may need resolving. While their discussion gets heated at times, their time together is revealing and cathartic for everybody.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Road To the Runway" - Tim Gunn introduces everyone to 15 new designers who will be competing against each other on Project Runway Season 12. He also teases the fact that one of three former designers, chosen strictly by the fans, will be rejoining the competition this season. Former alumni Nick Verreos and Michelle Lesniak Franklin provide their personal commentary about the designers. Tim Gunn introduces everyone to 15 new designers who will be competing against each other on Project Runway Season 12. He also teases the fact that one of three former designers, chosen strictly by the fans, will be rejoining the competition this season. Former alumni Nick Verreos and Michelle Lesniak Franklin provide their personal commentary about the designers.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "The Sky's the Limit" - In the season premiere, we meet 15 brand new designers on an airfield outside of NYC, and learn from Heidi and Tim that Kate (Season 11) will be rejoining the competition. The new designers witness a spectacular skydive that ends with their first challenge: Design a look that represents their aesthetic, but only using parachutes as material.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Million-Dollar Runway" - The designers are surprised to see armed security guards arrive on the Runway...until their models step out wearing millions of dollars of exquisite jewels. The designers must create a look based around the model, and jewelry, of their choosing.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "An Unconventional Coney Island" - The designers are taken to Coney Island and split into teams of two for the Yoplait Challenge. After asking patrons to describe different flavors of yogurt, they must then use these descriptive words as inspiration for their Runway look. The catch? The only fabric allowed in this challenge are from prizes they win at Coney Island.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Tie the Knot" - Jesse Tyler Ferguson, actor and founder of "Tie the Knot," challenges the designers to create a garment that incorporates and is inspired by bowties. The drama mounts as one designer proposes to his partner, while another leaves the show for good.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "You Choose Your Materials!" - For their second Team Challenge of the season, the designers are divided into four teams of three and told they are making a 3-piece mini collection inspired by their assigned Lexus Sedan. However, this is also an Unconventional Materials Challenge, so the designers must drive their Lexus' to various predetermined locations of their choosing in order to shop for this challenge.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Let's Go Glamping!" - Resource Water rewards the designers with a "glamping" trip in the woods, filled with activities and relaxation. As the designers get to rejuvenate, bond, and sketch in nature, their challenge is to find inspiration from the outdoors for a high fashion look. The show ends with high emotion as Tim Gunn decides he disagrees with the judges and uses his only "Tim Gunn Save."

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Shoes First!" - In a challenge for Marie Claire, the designers are taken to the infamous Marie Claire shoe closet and given the challenge of designing an outfit inspired by a pair of shoes. But in order to get their shoes, they must compete against each other in a fashion trivia contest.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Having a Field Day" - Heidi challenges the designers to create performance wear that is also fashionable for her New Balance collection. But first, the designers must participate in an obstacle course to see who gets an extra hour in the workroom and first dibs on fabric.

programme.title: Project Runway
programme.desc: "Let's Do Brunch" - The designers are treated to a beautiful Southern brunch in the city. However, their relaxing is cut short as Tim arrives and explains that their challenge is to design a look for the Modern Southern woman—or, the Belk customer. After a challenging runway, the judges send the bottom three designers back to the drawing board, where they have one hour to rework their looks and save themselves from elimination. Ultimately two designers win the challenge, and one is out.

programme.title: California: Pacific Coast Highway
programme.desc: On this ride up the PCH, Norman and his friend Imogen check out some beach dune buggies, ride the bike of the future and drop in on a podcast.

programme.title: Ouroboros
programme.desc: Madison confronts Strand about his mysterious destination. Nick, Alicia, and others inspect wreckage from a plane crash.

programme.title: Talking Dead: Fear the Walking Dead 203

programme.title: Friday Night In with The Morgans: Episode 2
programme.desc: The Morgans check in with their friends Sarah Wayne Callies, Michael Cudlitz, a farmer from their local community, plus a viewer at home, all appearing via video chat.

programme.title: Twice as Far
programme.desc: Two different groups leave Alexandria on supply runs. While both are concerned with the future of the community, immediate danger will derail them.

programme.title: Talking Dead on "Twice as Far"
programme.desc: Josh McDermitt & Christian Serratos discuss the episode, "Twice as Far," from the hit show The Walking Dead. Host Chris Hardwick.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: Dragonquest
programme.desc: After the ruthless Krill (Brian Thompson) harnesses the power of a deadly fire-breathing dragon, he begins a bloody campaign of world domination. From the ashes of a scorched village, Arkadi (Daniel Bonjour), an unassuming farm boy, embarks on an arduous journey to restore the lost pieces of a mystical amulet -- the only weapon powerful enough to destroy Krill. With the help of swordsman Maxim (Marc Singer) and his squire, Katya (Jennifer Dorogi), Arkadi struggles to save the world.

programme.title: Hercules Reborn
programme.desc: When a young man's bride is kidnapped by an evil king, he turns to Hercules for help. The fallen hero has been living in exile, banished for killing his family, but the young man's courage inspires Hercules. Together, they fight to rescue the bride and reclaim Hercules' honor.

programme.title: Jane White is Sick and Twisted
programme.desc: Jane White (Kim Little) is a disturbed young woman living in her own bizarre TV fantasy land. For Jane, life itself is a television program, and she dreams of becoming a star on the small screen. Convincing herself that Gerry King (David L. Lander), a popular talk show host, is her birth father, she sets out on an adventurous road trip -- aided by her equally looney boyfriend, Dick (Wil Wheaton) -- to confront her "father" on the air, and, just maybe, make a splash on reality television.

programme.title: Mega Shark vs Giant Octopus
programme.desc: Strange things are afoot in the depths of the sea. First a passenger plane vanishes over the Pacific Ocean. Then an oil platform is obliterated. Marine biologist Emma MacNeil (Deborah Gibson) is dispatched to investigate the phenomena, and, with the help of Japanese scientist Seiji Shimada (Vic Chao), she makes a discovery that will rock the world: An enormous prehistoric shark and a giant octopus have been awakened from their icy slumbers -- and they're hungry.

programme.title: Merlin and the War of the Dragons
programme.desc: Before growing into the legendary adviser to the Pendragons, a youthful Merlin spends his days studying with the Mage (Jürgen Prochnow), a master sorcerer, and honing his magical skills. When a fellow apprentice sorcerer, Hengest (Iago McGuire), grows jealous of Merlin's rapid progress, he rebels against their mutual mentor and betrays King Vortigen (Hefin Wyn) to Saxon invaders. As Hengest conjures an army of dragons, Merlin prepares to test his developing abilities in battle.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E1 | Mummy in a Catalogue
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a mummy's sarcophagus being sold in a holiday catalogue, Ben Franklin's glass harmonica, and a drunk elephant's rampage through Maine.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E2 | America's First Alien Abduction
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a man who paints a mountain in California, America's first alien abduction, as well as the stories about Gettysburg that your teachers left out.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E3 | The Handprint in the Jail Cell
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a war between mobsters over artichokes, as well as the story of an innocent man facing execution who leaves behind a handprint on his cell's wall that won't go away.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E4 | Aliens in New England
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a British priest who dressed as a mermaid, a father and son who created over 3,000 glass flowers, and a small town in New England that was besieged by UFOs.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E5 | Oddities in Pennsylvania
programme.desc: We explore the stories of a museum of medical oddities, three friends whose fates are all tied to the Battle of Gettysburg, as well as the town of Punxsutawney and their celebrated groundhog.

programme.title: Would You Believe It?, S1 E6 | The Thief Taker
programme.desc: Explore the stories of a man who painstakingly recreates miniature historic figures, and an English gentleman who would find stolen items for a small fee but turned out to be the thief.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E7 | First Contact
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E8 | Finale
programme.desc: The crew makes contact with an alien at long last, but this historic moment is cut short when they realize they have a chance to make it home through an interplanetary ripple. Stewart and Michael decide to stay behind to learn more about the alien's culture, only to be underwhelmed - when they return, Karen chews them out for their mistake. Meanwhile, Tina uses Zalian, A.R.T., holograms, sedatives, and magnets to give Kent and Natasha their first and only date. Both groups are ripped from their activities by a series of shocking revelations about the universe.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E1 | Into the Great Beyond... Beyond
programme.desc: Young Stewart Lipinski is made captain of an exploratory space mission into space...his older sister Karen is made his second in command, and is none too happy about it. When their ship and crew stumble into a different universe with no way home, Stewart and Karen have to figure out their differences in order to survive.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E2 | Getting to Know You
programme.desc: In an attempt to raise the morale of his frightened and fudge-riddled crew, Stewart initiates a bonding session that devolves into ice-breaker games. When Karen discovers that one of the crew members is actually an alien who's implanted memories in their heads, they play a high-stakes game of Mafia to weed out the intruder.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E3 | The Death of A.R.T.
programme.desc: The crew prepares a video to broadcast to anyone that might be listening in space. ART gets knocked off the ship and then saves the crew when a planet starts to form around the ship.

programme.title: Other Space, S1 E4 | Ted Talks
programme.desc: Tina finds a way to get dumped by her Earthbound boyfriend despite having no contact with Earth. The ship turns out to be infested with spyware, but not the way you would think.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E1 | Jason Williams
programme.desc: Psychic Sue Evans assists the family of a man who never made it home after a night out drinking with his buddies.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E2 | Amie Hoffman
programme.desc: Psychic Nancy Weber is called in by the family of teen Amie Hoffman, who disappeared on the way home from work. Then, after another young woman is murdered, the police work together with Weber to track down the serial killer.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E3 | Margie Calciano
programme.desc: Psychic Lauren Thibodeau helps a police detective with a cold case, leading him to a killer now several states away from the scene of the crime.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E4 | Rachel Domas
programme.desc: Veteran psychic Nancy Weber assists a rookie cop in solving the case of a 14-year-old girl who missed the school bus and was never seen again.

programme.title: Psychic Investigators, S1 E5 | Alexis Burke
programme.desc: Psychic Laurie McQuary helps Oregon detective Robert Lee identify a missing-persons case as a murder.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Scooter Plank, Deer Jewels/100 Year Old Egg Nog, Trapped Under The Ice" - Contestants must ride a motorized scooter across a narrow plank 100 feet above the ground and devour roasted reindeer parts. Host: Joe Rogan.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: "Helicopter Bodt Drop, Slug Bugs and Bile, Build-A-Bridge" - For the first stunt contestants have to hang from a helicopter skit and drop into the water below as the helicopter flew over a buoy. Once in the water, they would have to retrieve a flag from underneath the buoy, swim with it to a platform, and clip it on a flagpole. Stunt two has them slug it out as they have to eat 10 live slugs and drink a shot of cow bile. For the final, contestants have to build a bridge on two cables from the top of one building to another and climb across the wooden slats provided moving them along the way. The contestant across the fastest would be the Fear Factor Champion and win $50K.

programme.title: Joe La Puma Breaks Down How To Pair Sneakers with Your Fits | Tunnel Takedown

programme.title: Marcus Jordan Says New Air Jordan Project Is On The Way | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: Son of NBA legend Michael Jordan, Marcus, stops by this week on 'Tunnel Takedown.' He teases an upcoming Air Jordan project with his store Trophy Room coming in 2020, and gives his thoughts on the latest fits from stars like Kemba Walker and PJ Tucker. Host Racks Hogan, NBA champion Matt Barnes, and Creative Director Gia Seo also discuss Carmelo Anthony's style to celebrate his recent return to the NBA and roast some more of the league's most flagrant fits.

programme.title: Racks Loses It Over Russell Westbrook and JaVale McGee Needs a Shirt | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week, Racks Hogan, Mouse Jones and Kalysse Anthony break down their favorite looks of the week and get into a heated discussion over Russell Westbrook. Plus, renowned stylist Derek Roche previews the upcoming style trend while on the set of French Montana's new video. Then, Kalysse walks us through the do's and don'ts of Dopp kits and the hosts go in on JaVale McGee's bold fit.

programme.title: TMarkGotKickss Vs WhoisHeck In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of #LIFEATCOMPLEX Presents Sneaker Battle, we are putting two acquaintances against one another. In one corner we have the Chief Operating Officer of PrivateLabelNYC, Hector Aponte, taking on the outfit grid king, Terrel Marcus aka TMarkGotKickss! programme.title: Kyle Kuzma Shows Up in Supreme and PJ Tucker Keeps It Comfy | Tunnel Takedown
programme.desc: This week, hosts Racks Hogan, Kalysse Anthony and Mouse Jones get into it over PJ Tucker's satin Dolce & Gabbana outfit, and break down Kevin Durant and Kyle Kuzma's pre-game fits. Then, celebrity stylist Derek Roche shows us how to put looks together for a tall, athletic basketball player. Plus, the hosts go head-to-head in a game of Guess Who, and celebrate the legacies of Dwyane Wade and Dirk Nowitzki.

programme.title: Detroit Pistons Langston Galloway vs Nike SB Collector in a Sneaker Battle From Home!
programme.desc: On this episode we have NBA player and sneaker collector, Langston Galloway, from the Detroit Pistons going up against Complex's "Best Kept Secret" Kevin Luyster in an epic Sneaker Battle From Home! programme.title: Qias Omar vs HesKicks In A Sneaker Battle From Home! | #LIFEATCOMPLEX
programme.desc: On this episode of Sneaker Battle From Home, we pit two "Shoetubers" against one another. The two put on a display of versatility for the public in an incredible 5 round battle! Make sure you watch and debate for yourself on who won this battle!

programme.title: Lavar Ball vs Jacques Slade In A Sneaker Battle From Home | #LIFEATCOMPLEX

programme.title: Watch King Combs Choose Between Drake & Pusha T for Best Rapper of the Decade | Complex Brackets

programme.desc: In New York City, pizza isn't just food, it's a way of life. But which iconic NY-style dish reigns supreme: the Sicilian square or the classic round pie? programme.title: The Ultimate Viral Pizza Showdown with Mike Hauke, Mark Iacono, and Scott Wiener | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Ramen, tacos, cheeseburgers, fried chicken-Mike Hauke of Tony Boloney's can turn just about anything into a pizza. But has the undisputed king of Instagramable pies finally met his match? In a brand new episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell attempts to wrestle the crown from Dr. Franken-slice in a viral pizza showdown for the ages. Will Nicole's popcorn-crusted bar pie be enough to topple Mike's bone-in "Flaming Cowboy"? Only pizza pros Mark Iacono and Scott Wiener can decide.

programme.title: Sean Evans and Farideh Sadeghin Taste Test Chicago Deep Dish Made by Two New Yorkers | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Can two thin-crust loving New Yorkers make deep dish pizza fit for a Chicago native? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza maker she must face off against Josephine Giordano of Lenny's Pizza to see if she can conquer the Windy City's most controversial culinary export. Will Nicole's chicken parm-packed deep dish be enough to the win the favor of Muchies' Farideh Sadeghin and Chicago native Sean Evans?

programme.title: The Perfect Detroit-Style Pizza with Cliff Skighwalker, Adam Richman, and Reina Scully | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Detroit is home to some of America's most delicious pizza. But who can create the ultimate Motor City-inspired slice? As host Nicole Russell continues her quest to become the world's next master pizza-maker, she must face off against chef Cliff Skighwalker in a good ol' fashioned pan-pizza throwdown.

programme.title: Mythical Chef Josh and Nicole Russell Make Taco Bell and Beef Patty Inspired Pizzas | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: Pizza is the ultimate blank canvas for culinary innovation. In this episode of Pizza Wars, host Nicole Russell faces off against Mythical Chef Josh to see who can create the ultimate "mashup pie." At Mythical Kitchen, Josh has perfected the art of fast-food fusion, but will his Doritos Locos Taco Pizza be enough to take down Nicole's Jamaican beef patty-inspired pie? The choice is up to this week's judges: Complex's Speedy Morman and chef Jae Lee of Nowon in NYC.

programme.title: Neapolitan-Style Pizza at Home with Vito Iacopelli, Nicole Russell, and Daym Drops | Pizza Wars
programme.desc: It's the season finale of Pizza Wars, and host Nicole Russell must now battle the final boss: master pizzaiolo Vito Iacopelli. Will Nicole's tandoori-inspired pizza be enough to impress food review legend Daym Drops, or will Vito's "connolo-style" slice steal the golden pizza trophy away from her for good? Only one oven can handle a pizza cage match of this magnitude: The Ooni Koda 16. Tune in to a very special episode of Pizza Wars to see who comes out on top.

programme.title: Maluma Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Global Colombian superstar Maluma goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in Miami and talks about his love for the Nike Mags, meeting Virgil Abloh, and seeing his grandfather's appreciation for New Balance.

programme.title: Sean Evans Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Hot Ones host Sean Evans goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his favorite sneakers growing up, getting his own Reebok collaboration, and some of his trademark sneakers.

programme.title: Noah Beck Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: TikTok star Noah Beck goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Cookies N' Kicks in Los Angeles and talks about how he got into Air Force 1s, who had the best sneakers in the Sway House, and his girlfriend Dixie D'Amelio ruining a pair of Off-White x Air Jordan IVs.

programme.title: Moneybagg Yo Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Moneybagg Yo goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his mom working for Nike in Memphis, winning dice games to get money for sneakers, and his crazy sneaker collection.

programme.title: Soulja Boy Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Soulja Boy goes Sneaker Shopping at SoleStage in Los Angeles and talks about being the rapper who started the Bape trend, being the first rapper to wear Nike Mags, buying Kanye West's Louis Vuitton sneakers in Cancun, and how lucrative his Yums sneaker deal was.

programme.title: Pharrell Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Pharrell Williams goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at The Webster in Miami and talks about Nigo giving him Bape sneakers, why his Ice Cream sneakers were blurred out of the "Drop It Like It's Hot" video, his sneaker history, and Adidas collaborations, and more.

programme.title: Karol G Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Multi-platinum reggaeton artist Karol G joins Complex's Joe La Puma at Flight Club in New York City to talk about getting Air Force 1s while growing up in Colombia, why she loves Air Jordan 4s, and why she thinks J Balvin's Air Jordan 1s are important.

programme.title: Michael Strahan Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: NFL Hall of Famer Michael Strahan goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods for the Season 12 finale and talks about getting Air Jordans 1s in 1985, sitting front row at Kanye West's Yeezy Season fashion show, and his viral prank of getting his teeth fixed.

programme.title: Rod Wave Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Multi-platinum artist Rod Wave goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Kickzr4us in Tampa, Florida, and talks about his latest album, giving away Air Jordans, and his favorite Nike SB Dunks.

programme.title: Rowdy Rebel Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: Rowdy Rebel joins Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about his favorite Air Jordans, wearing Off-White x Air Jordan 1s when he went home, and wanting to go shopping with Bobby Shmurda in the future.

programme.title: G Herbo Goes Sneaker Shopping With Complex
programme.desc: G Herbo goes Sneaker Shopping with Complex's Joe La Puma at Stadium Goods in New York City and talks about how he used to clean sneakers growing up, camping out for shoes, and why he loves Air Force 1s so much.

programme.title: How to Cook a Double-Dipped Roast Beef Burger with George Motz | Burger Scholar Sessions
programme.desc: The double-dipped roast beef burger is an icon of Brooklyn, New York, and Burger Scholar George Motz is here to teach you how to make one at home. This regional one-off burger-known locally as the "Gargiulo"- hails from the historic roast-beef emporium Brennan & Carr. Here, the burger patty is topped with freshly sliced roast beef, sauteed onions, American cheese, and is eventually dunked in a vat of piping hot beef broth.

programme.title: How to Cook a Perfect Steakhouse Burger with George Motz | Burger Scholar Sessions
programme.desc: Burger Scholar George Motz usually smashes his patties with childlike glee. But today, he has his eyes set on a different prize: the luxurious, thick, dry-aged steakhouse burger! The beauty of this style is its lack of adornments-a juicy patty, cheese, and a sturdy bun, which all help emphasize the beef. In the words of Motz: "Take the upgrade people!" Without further ado, learn how to cook a perfect steakhouse burger at home!

programme.title: How to Cook a Loose Meat Sandwich with George Motz | Burger Scholar Sessions
programme.desc: Here's a weird one for you-the Loose Meat Sandwich from the Midwest. Is it a hamburger? We're not entirely sure. Is it amazing? Hell yes! Think of a Sloppy Joe, minus the slop. If you close your eyes and bite into a loose meat sandwich, you taste all the elements of a hamburger: bun, beef, seasoning, mustard, onion, pickle. And now it's George's job to bring this Midwest icon into your home.

programme.title: How to Cook a Mississippi Slugburger with George Motz | Burger Scholar Sessions
programme.desc: Burger Scholar George Motz teaches you how to cook a hyper-regional slugburger from Northern Mississippi. Borne out of the Great Depression, the slugburger patty combines beef and bread crumbs-a method that was used to extend the meat supply. As the bread crumbs toast on the griddle, they absorb the rendered beef fat, creating the ultimate crispy burger. Here is your master class on how to make a regional slugburger at home.

programme.title: How to Cook a Texas-Style Smoked Burger with George Motz | Burger Scholar Sessions
programme.desc: Burger Scholar George Motz has taught us about fried burgers and steamed burgers, but did you know about the smoked burger from Texas? In this episode, George teaches you how to apply the principles of barbecue to a burger. With a simple offset smoker set-up, you can achieve the perfect smoke ring on this burger right in your own backyard. Here is your master class on the Texas smoked burger.

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: DENIAL is a documentary about electricity, identity, family, and about the many ways we lie to ourselves when faced with overwhelming facts. It is the story of a family coming to terms with complex personal truths against the backdrop of a global crisis.

programme.title: One Life To Blossom
programme.desc: One Life To Blossom follows the life of black transgender activist Blossom C. Brown when she undergoes her dream of getting face feminization surgery all within a year before making nationwide headlines at the 2019 CNN LBGTQ+ Town Hall.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: A raw, eye-opening documentary following a group of impassioned theatre students who come together to produce a play aiming to shed light on the many stigmas and equality-rights issues faced by LGBT youth in the United States today.

programme.title: Gay Mean Girls
programme.desc: S1 E1-2 | Lucy is a "very good ally" who stares at her best friend Miranda.... a lot. They hatch a plan to start Gay Prom Royalty together to promote equality at their school. Miranda pays Lucy a visit on a day off from school. We get a glimpse into Lucy's home life.

programme.title: Gay Mean Girls
programme.desc: S1 E3-4 | Lucy visits the Gay Straight Alliance to gain support for Gay Prom Royalty. She shares some personal secrets to old and new friends. Anita's throwing a party and a surprise promposal! Lucy has social anxiety about it.

programme.title: Oy Vey! My Son Is Gay!
programme.desc: Oy Vey! My Son Is Gay! is the story of the Hirsch's, a Jewish family living in the North Shore of Long Island, where every Friday night Shirley Hirsch (Lainie Kazan) invites another "perfect" girl for Shabbat dinner in hopes that her son, Nelson (John Lloyd Young), will marry a nice Jewish girl. When Shirley and Martin (Saul Rubinek) once again set him up on a date, Nelson reveals that he is already seeing someone. Shirley and Martin are thrilled and can't wait to meet the lucky lady. Nelson finally breaks the news to his parents that he is gay. At first, Shirley and Martin are confused and distraught, but when the reality starts to set in they begin to blame one another for Nelson's sexuality.

programme.title: Barbelle
programme.desc: S1 E1-3 | Alice and Veronica attempt to tell band manager Karen that they've broken up - as a band and a couple. They quickly learn that breaking up is not an option. Alice and Veronica start work on their second album. Band manager Karen introduces a new collaborator: the former CB3 child star turned pop starlet Lulu St. Claire. Axis Records executive Richard shows up to hear Alice and Veronica's progress on their new album. Alice takes a step forward with Lulu.

programme.title: BIFL
programme.desc: Expectations, different shades of intimacy, & what it really means to love someone.

programme.title: Scales

programme.desc: "Fighting for the Truth" - An employee is found dead in a restaurant kitchen. Clues found near the body include an empty cash register, a knife and a trail of blood splotches leading to a vandalized car in the parking lot.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Dying to Be Young" - A healthy 53-year-old woman is found dead in bed. After performing an autopsy and taking blood and tissue samples, Dr. G cannot find the cause of death.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "Death on the Road" - A man is found dead in a motel room due to multiple shotgun wounds. Dr. G proves the scene isn't what it seems.

programme.title: Dr. G: Medical Examiner
programme.desc: "The Mourning After" - Rusty Updike has asked his ex-wife Vesta on a cruise. The couple haven't seen each other for 15 years but Vesta decides that a cruise with her ex might make for a nice change of pace.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, the body of college co-ed Laura Salmon was found on a Middle Tennessee farm, covered with her own denim jeans as well as the jeans of the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1969, 25-year-old phone operator Diane Maxwell is raped and murdered. Her brother promised he'd find out who was responsible and bring the killer to justice.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The crime scene was especially violent: A husband and wife had been shot to death in their bedroom. Was their 16-year-daughter complicit?

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young, attractive hairdresser was sexually assaulted and murdered in her own beauty salon. The evidence at the crime scene didn't match any of the suspects and the case went cold for ten years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A human skeleton was discovered in the North Carolina marshlands. Investigators learned she'd been dead for 18 months.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After shooting his victims in the head, the killer staged the scene, placed the incriminating evidence into a plastic bag and tossed it into the river.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a tragic twist of fate, just days after the woman sold her home and moved to a modest trailer, a fire took both the trailer and her life. But the autopsy proved this was no accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A security guard disappeared from his post without a trace his remains were found a year later in a remote camp site.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man who had committed crimes including murder was not caught. Almost 50 years later, advances in technology and handwriting analysis uncovered the criminal.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured, and police believed he was the victim of a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When an elderly couple died in a suspicious house fire, their son became the prime suspect. Investigators turned to forensic science to determine if the fire had been set deliberately, or if it was an unfortunate accident.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters found a skull in a Texas canyon, police found bits of clothing, small bones and a strand of hair. A forensic artist reconstructed her face. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A married couple decided to escape the cold of winter with a mini-vacation in Key West. The wife went missing, and police searched every square inch of the island, they found nothing but a pair of sandals which might have belonged to her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two young children was found dead in her bedroom. Her death was ruled a suicide - but when investigators learned she had almost died in a house fire three years earlier, they decided to take another look at the evidence.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Bombings are difficult to solve, because the perpetrator isn't usually at the scene, and the evidence goes up in smoke. In this case pieces of plastic the size of grains of sand hold the key to a man's murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The wife of an Air Force officer was found dead in her bed with a plastic laundry bag near her face. Further investigation proved that the scene had been staged. Her death wasn't an accident, it was cold-blooded murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a fire destroyed most of a home and a young boy went missing, police organized the largest search in the history of their small town. First the boy's backpack was discovered five miles from home, and then his body was found 50 miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: highway patrolman was dispatched to what he thought would be a routine traffic accident until he looked in the car. While he had no formal training in forensic science, he had seen hundreds of accidents - but never as much blood as this.

programme.title: Total Wipeout

There is a cash prize waiting for the winner, plus a shiny trophy, a lifetime of amusing anecdotes, and a nickname from host Richard Hammond.

programme.title: Total Wipeout

This episode sees the return of the finalists from across the series as they compete for the ultimate title, 'Champions of Champions'. They pit themselves against some of the hardest obstacles we've ever witnessed on their journey to get to the Wipeout Zone.

programme.title: Benelli Presents: Donnie Vincent’s Winds of Adak
programme.desc: In November of 2019, explorer and hunter Donnie Vincent traveled to Adak Island, Alaska. Located at the westernmost end in the Aleutian chain, Adak is wilderness with the exception of a now-abandoned naval base that once housed more than 6,000 people. Winds of Adak chronicles Donnie’s exploration of the island, a hauntingly desolate abandoned military outpost and three unique hunts—caribou, ptarmigan and sea ducks—as the unforgiving elements, the terrain and the Bering Sea test both man and equipment.

programme.title: Steak Tips
programme.desc: We felt confident that we could rescue steak tips and fries and turn them into something you would love.

programme.title: Favorite Italian Classics
programme.desc: We demonstrate Italian dishes: Grilled Chicken alla Diavola, Frico, and Strawberries with Balsamic Vinegar.

programme.title: Appetizers
programme.desc: We like appetizers that deliver big flavor without much work. This means spiced nuts that are not overly sweet, spinach dip that is bold and creamy (not watery and insipid), and beef satay that is tender and vibrant.

programme.title: Regional Classics
programme.desc: Some local dishes become so popular that they transcend their region. Gumbo is a taste of Louisiana in a big old bowl. And Cincinnati chili is American original, served with buttered spaghetti, kidney beans, cheddar cheese, and chopped onions. Our goal when developing our versions of these dishes was to remain faithful to the originals while making the recipes approachable for cooks who may not have grown up with them.

programme.title: Rethinking Barbecued Chicken
programme.desc: If you're a fan of saucy barbecued chicken, you'll love pulled chicken. Similar to the more traditional pulled pork, it's simply tender shreds of smoky grilled chicken moistened with barbecue sauce. We set out to develop pulled chicken that could be as good as pulled pork, not just a close second.

programme.title: Deep-Dish Apple Pie
programme.desc: With its mounds of tender apples and flaky pastry crust, deep-dish apple pie should take your breath away.

programme.title: Fish and Chips at Home
programme.desc: The problem with English-style fish and chips is that you've got to hop a plane across the Atlantic to enjoy the most authentic version. We wanted to be able to serve English-style fish and chips-large pieces of moist and delicate cod in a crisp and tender coating with thick-cut fries-at home.

programme.title: Lighter Family Favorites
programme.desc: Whether we admit it or not, there are some dishes that, while tasty, are just too high in fat and calories to be enjoyed on a regular basis. Even a modest portion of macaroni and cheese or chicken Parmesan is prohibitive. But that doesn't need to be the case.

programme.title: Regional Italian-American Favorites
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof makes host Julia Collin Davison a New York classic, Prosciutto Bread. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of provolone cheese. Finally, test cook Ashley Moore shows Bridget how to make the easiest-ever Drop Meatballs.

programme.title: Holiday Feast
programme.desc: Test cook Ashley Moore shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a Crumb-Crusted Rack of Lamb that is perfect for the holidays. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried shows host Julia Collin Davison his top picks of electric knives. Finally, test cook Christie Morrison shows Julia how to make a showstopping Brussels Sprout Gratin.

programme.title: Southern Discoveries
programme.desc: Test cook Bryan Roof teaches host Julia Collin Davison how to make the perfect South Carolina Smoked Fresh Ham. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Julia to a tasting of Spiral Sliced Bone-in Hams. Next, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his pick for potato mashers. And finally, test cook Christie Morrison shares a fool-proof Smashed Potato Salad recipe with host, Bridget Lancaster.

programme.title: When Only Chocolate Will Do
programme.desc: Julia Collin Davison shows host Bridget Lancaster how to make a show-stopping Mississippi Mud Pie. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reveals his pick for the best miniature food processor on the market. And Finally, Bridget reveals the secrets to making Whoopie Pies right at home.

programme.title: Southern Specialties
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison cook up a Southern specialty-Tennessee Pulled Turkey Sandwiches. Then, equipment expert Adam Ried reviews paper towels. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of extra-sharp cheddar cheese. And finally, test cook Bryan Roof shows Bridget a regional recipe for Eastern North Carolina Fish Stew.

programme.title: Holiday Roast and Potatoes
programme.desc: Hosts Bridget Lancaster and Julia Collin Davison streamline a classic recipe for Boneless Rib Roast with Yorkshire Pudding and Jus. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges Bridget to a tasting of black tea. And finally, test cook Ashley Moore makes Bridget a family-favorite recipe for Lighthouse Inn Potatoes.

programme.title: Kebabs and Rice
programme.desc: Host Julia Collin Davison uncovers the secrets to making the best grilled shrimp and vegetable kebabs. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of whole-milk Greek yogurt. Finally, test cook Dan Souza shows Julia how to make Persian-style rice with a crispy, golden crust.

programme.title: Pantry Pastas
programme.desc: Host Bridget Lancaster uncovers the secrets for making perfect Pasta e Ceci. Next, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Julia Collin Davison to a tasting of parmesan. Then, science expert Dan Souza reveals the science behind parmesan's signature flavor. Finally, test cook Elle Simone shows Bridget how to make the ultimate Penne Arrabbiata.

programme.title: Pressure Cooker Perfection
programme.desc: Test cook Becky Hays makes host Julia Collin Davison the fastest-ever Farmhouse Chicken Noodle Soup in the pressure cooker. Then, tasting expert Jack Bishop challenges host Bridget Lancaster to a tasting of Gruyere. Next, science expert Dan Souza reveals the science behind pressure cookers. Finally, test cook Elle Simone makes Bridget the perfect Pressure-Cooker Pot Roast.

programme.title: What's For Dinner? Stir-fry Tofu with Spicy Basil Tomatoes
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking a stir-fry tofu with spicy basil tomatoes, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: A Taste of History - The Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Chef Staib journeys down the Santa Fe trail through Kansas to discover where travelers regrouped before the next perilous leg of their journey. Recipes like steamed venison pudding and bison stew are prepared at a local stagecoach stop.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - The Real Chefs Garden
programme.desc: In this episode we experience Seattle’s most pure, organic, direct and delicious “Farm to Table” experience with Chef Brian Scheehser. He practices sustainable farming in his own three‐acre garden, with the hand of a farmer and the meticulous nature of a chef. Part Chef‐Part Farmer, Scheehser offers expert tips on cooking and insight on how to grow your garden.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Rice Chronicles
programme.desc: Rice, the bread and butter of the Korean table is explored from Busan, Korea’s second largest city, all the way to Seoul. Along the way, Marja and her dear friend, the actress Heather Graham, learn about instant rice, tteok (a pasta-like ingredient made of ground rice) and visit Bibigo, a new chain of contemporary restaurants serving fresh variations of bibimbap.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Jean-Claude Poilevey, David Machado, and Norman Love
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Lyonnaise Salad, Halibut Cheeks with Potatoes and Artichoke, and Banana-Chocolate Tart with Malted Milk Ice Cream. Restaurants include: Le Bouchon in Chicago, Pazzo Ristorante in Portland, and The Ritz-Carlton in Naples.

programme.title: Superfoods with Chef Walter Staib - Apples
programme.desc: See Apples in a new light when served with Green Tea Pork Tenderloin, Apple and Cranberry Cobbler and a Late Summer Superfoods Salad.

programme.title: Martin Yan - Quick and Easy - China & Korea
programme.desc: Two culinary powerhouses come together, as Martin and his guest, barbeque master Rick Browne, explore the difference between Korean and Chinese flavours to create these quick and easy dishes.

programme.title: Dine & Dish Nation - Lovers Only El Barzon The Rattlesnake Club
programme.desc: Host Kam Carman welcomes Barbara Johnson, Jarod Robert and Elizabeth Kraft, who review upscale sandwiches and salads at Lovers Only Mexican and Italian specialties a la Chef Norberto Garita at El Barzon and steaks and seafood at the Rattlesnake Club located on the Detroit Riverfront.

programme.title: Graham Kerr's Kitchen - Fruit Soufflé Omelet
programme.desc: Use low-fat egg substitute in a sweet fruit omelet topped with creamy orange sauce or a mushroom and spinach omelet with fresh dill and Parmesan cheese.

programme.title: Hawaii Cooks with Roy Yamaguchi - Oodles of Noodles
programme.desc: A visit to Crown noodle factory in Honolulu reveals the fine art of noodle making. This episode also features a variety of Asian and Italian pasta dishes such as Vietnamese Summer Rolls, Chicken Macadamia Nut Pasta and Roy's Asian Pasta Primavera. Master sommelier Chuck Furuya is on hand to recommend the right wine and pasta combination.

programme.title: Justin Wilson's Easy Cookin' - Turtle Stew & Blueberry Cobbler
programme.desc: Join Justin as he demonstrates how to prepare and cook Turtle Stew & Blueberry Cobbler!

programme.title: What's For Dinner? Stir-fry Tofu with Spicy Basil Tomatoes
programme.desc: Ken and Mary Jo have a fun time in the kitchen cooking a stir-fry tofu with spicy basil tomatoes, plus a few other excellent dishes.

programme.title: A Taste of History - The Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Chef Staib journeys down the Santa Fe trail through Kansas to discover where travelers regrouped before the next perilous leg of their journey. Recipes like steamed venison pudding and bison stew are prepared at a local stagecoach stop.

programme.title: Chefs A' Field: Green Cuisine - The Real Chefs Garden
programme.desc: In this episode we experience Seattle’s most pure, organic, direct and delicious “Farm to Table” experience with Chef Brian Scheehser. He practices sustainable farming in his own three‐acre garden, with the hand of a farmer and the meticulous nature of a chef. Part Chef‐Part Farmer, Scheehser offers expert tips on cooking and insight on how to grow your garden.

programme.title: Kimchi Chronicles - The Rice Chronicles
programme.desc: Rice, the bread and butter of the Korean table is explored from Busan, Korea’s second largest city, all the way to Seoul. Along the way, Marja and her dear friend, the actress Heather Graham, learn about instant rice, tteok (a pasta-like ingredient made of ground rice) and visit Bibigo, a new chain of contemporary restaurants serving fresh variations of bibimbap.

programme.title: Great Chefs of America: Jean-Claude Poilevey, David Machado, and Norman Love
programme.desc: Recipes included with this episode: Lyonnaise Salad, Halibut Cheeks with Potatoes and Artichoke, and Banana-Chocolate Tart with Malted Milk Ice Cream. Restaurants include: Le Bouchon in Chicago, Pazzo Ristorante in Portland, and The Ritz-Carlton in Naples.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Science on the Great Barrier Reef
programme.desc: Cousteau explores the Great Barrier Reef. He then heads to James Cook University to get an up-close look at some of the country's deadliest creatures. Philippe ends his journey by visiting the Australian Institute of Marine Science.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - New Zealand
programme.desc: Cousteau travels to New Zealand, where he explores Auckland's volcanic field and comes face-to-face with one of the largest insects on the planet.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Natural Wonders
programme.desc: Cousteau heads to Hawaii to see a waterfall of lava pouring into the ocean. We'll then visit the legendary Antelope Canyon of Arizona, walk atop a unique frozen lake in Alberta, and take a magical scuba dive into a cenote in Mexico.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Student Explorer
programme.desc: In this episode, we reveal the winner of our first ever #StudentExplorer Contest. Philippe and the lucky student then head to Mexico to swim with whale sharks in the wild.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Guardians of the Environment
programme.desc: Phillipe unearths some of the scientists, students and citizens working to save the planet. From creating safe havens for endangered species to introducing disadvantaged kids to the wonders of the oceans, environment guardians are making a positive impact

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Pennsylvania
programme.desc: Philippe travels to Pennsylvania to explore a hidden wonder beneath the Appalachian Mountains and see how researchers at Carnegie Mellon University are using cutting-edge science to measure air quality in Pittsburgh.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Rangers
programme.desc: At Yellowstone we learn how rescue dogs find people caught in an avalanche and how rangers manage trails in harsh conditions. From there trips to Hawaii and Utah will see how rangers keep visitors safe and how technology can connect us to our parks.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Environmental Engineers
programme.desc: A stop in Seattle reveals how migrating salmon can bypass America's busiest locks. And finally, a trip to Mexico reveals the ancient symbolism hidden in the Mayan ruins at Chichén Itzá

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Animal Coexistence
programme.desc: We travel to Australia to catch the world's deadliest jellyfish and see how climate change could lead them to some of the country's most popular beaches. We visit California to see how the California Condor continues to slowly recover.

programme.title: Xploration Awesome Planet - Farmers
programme.desc: We'll join an oyster farmer as he pulls in a harvest off the coast of southeastern Louisiana, and then visit an aquaponics farm in Los Angeles to see how the owner is promoting sustainable food sources.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Prairie Grasses, Solar Flower
programme.desc: Jenn partners with an ecologist in Cheyenne, Wyoming to learn about different types of prairie grasses and how to care for them Kevin learns about ways to make a home more resistant against wildfires in Future House, Ross sees a robotic, ground mounted solar array that mimics a sunflower.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Smart Irrigation, Jimmy DiResta
programme.desc: Jenn travels to Orlando to upgrade an irrigation system the team looks at more Home Inspection Nightmares Tom discusses kitchen renovations Kevin returns to upstate New York to build an Adirondack-style outdoor chair with maker Jimmy DiResta.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Water Filter, Bathroom Caulking
programme.desc: Richard travels to Los Angeles to update a water filter on a retro faucet Mark explains the uses for different types of masonry jointers Nathan explains when and how to use a Japanese pull saw Tom demonstrates the correct materials and techniques required for re-caulking a bathtub.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Fix Foundation, Textured Ceiling
programme.desc: Mark repoints a crumbling fieldstone foundation and shares an important lesson about water management on the outside of the house Tom discusses the proper disposal techniques for oily rags to prevent spontaneous combustion instead of scraping, Mauro smooths over a textured ceiling using joint compound.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Stair Treads, Gas Stove Pipe
programme.desc: Tom teaches a homeowner how to replace split-level stair treads in his midcentury modern home Jenn shares some tips about pruners Richard shortens a gas pipe for a homeowner whose new stove does not fit against the wall because it is getting stuck on the pipe.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Restore Fireplace, Porch Swing
programme.desc: Roger and Jenn share some tips for killing weeds without hurting the lawn Mark delicately restores a damaged, historic fireplace that is built with custom, nearly irreplaceable bricks Richard and Ross discuss improvements to thermostats and how they contribute to comfort in a home Tom adds structure to a porch in order to safely hang a swing.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Scorched Floor, Hardy Plantings
programme.desc: Ross tests out a new, smart stud finder Nathan travels to Portland, Oregon to repair an original wood floor that was burned from a face down hot iron Tom gives a general overview of a table saw and the best techniques to use it safely and effectively Jenn helps a homeowner replace and improve foundation plantings that have been crushed from snow piles.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Humidity Mystery, Brick Patch
programme.desc: Tom discusses the conversations a homeowner and a contractor should have before starting a renovation project Richard travels to Orlando to diagnose and repair an HVAC system that is creating way too much humidity Mauro demonstrates the technique for using a paint sprayer Mark travels to Denver to patch a hole in a brick wall.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Deck Staining, Water Monitoring
programme.desc: Tom demonstrates how to sharpen a knife Mauro teaches a homeowner how to re-stain her deck Mark demonstrates the best way to build a fire in order to prevent smoke from filling up the room in Future House, Ross travels to Los Angeles to learn about innovations being made to automatic water shutoff valves.

programme.title: Ask TOH | Historic Plantings, Wood Utensils
programme.desc: Jenn helps a homeowner add some curb appeal to his house using Victorian plants to match the design of his house the team shares more home inspection nightmares Mauro demonstrates how to accurately match a paint color Tom and Kevin hand carve wooden serving utensils using leftover pine from a previous Build It project.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | The Net-Zero Bungalow
programme.desc: Tom and Kevin cross the bridge from Newport, RI to Jamestown where they tour the next project – a 1920’s bungalow which will become a larger net zero house. They meet the family and builder. Richard and Kevin visit another net zero home. Demo begins.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | Net Zero From the Ground Up
programme.desc: Shingles with asbestos are removed. Kevin visits a manufacturer in Pennsylvania that makes precast concrete walls. Homeowner Donald gives Kevin a historic tour of Jamestown.After the hole is prepped, the foundation wall panels arrive and are placed.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | HVAC of the Future
programme.desc: Jeff shows Kevin how he’s framing the net zero house. Richard demonstrates heat loss and gain to design a balanced HVAC system. He and Don visit the International Builders Show. Now that the house is open, Kevin can see the old wiring and plumbing.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | A Charleston Family House is Reborn
programme.desc: New apprentices join the team in Rhode Island as the roof goes up. The homeowners visit a cabinet showroom to finalize their plans. The house gets sheathed. It’s the finish line at Judith’s house in Charleston. Kevin and Tom take the grand tour.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | Ramp Up the R Value
programme.desc: Insulation is crucial to a net zero house. Kevin finds Jeff and the apprentices starting the work. Dana shops for efficient yet decorative lighting. Tom and Jeff work with the apprentices to build false rafter tails and then they install them.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | Net-Zero Blanket
programme.desc: Roof insulation is next step at the net zero house. Richard tours the basement of The Breakers in Newport. Kevin meets Congressman Norcross at the house, who is also an electrician. Apprentices install and flash windows.

programme.title: The Jamestown Net-Zero House | Modern Barn Raising
programme.desc: The electrician installs a load center at the Idea House. Tom teaches the apprentices the correct application of cedar roof shingles. Kevin and Jeff add insulation to the basement. Tom shows Mary how to block behind walls with future cabinets and wall fixtures. A pre-cut post and beam barn gets raised.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Four" - On the fourth day, the remaining chefs compete in a blindfold taste test. The losers must accept a difficult punishment while the winners dine with Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Five" - To advance in this challenge, the seven remaining chefs must purchase and prepare food for a wedding reception.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Six" - Melissa joins the men in a competition to see which team can prepare better lobster dishes. But there's a catch: the teams must kill their crustaceans first.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Seven " - The six remaining contestants must make appetizers and entrées from leftovers, then both teams must craft their own menus for the evening's dinner service.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Eight" - Chef Ramsay consolidates the five remaining contestants into one team, but first they must compete against one another to impress 100 hungry high school students.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Nine" - The three remaining chefs prepare gourmet versions of classic American dishes for outside judges: their mothers, who don't know whose plates they're sampling.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Ten (Part One)" - The final two contestants take on a final challenge that involves more than just cooking: they must design and manage their own restaurants.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 3, Day Ten (Part Two) " - In the season finale, tempers flare as the two contestants prepare one last dinner service for Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 15 Chefs Compete" - Chef Gordon Ramsay returns for a fourth season of culinary torture. Fifteen chefs will compete for the chance to work at Ramsay's own restaurant in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen
programme.desc: "Season 4, 14 Chefs Compete" - The season's first challenge finds the contestants slicing halibut into thin six-ounce fillets. One member of each team must serve as maître d' during the dining service.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sabatiello's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Sabatiello's and finds a hot-headed owner who is deep in debt. The owner gets so angry at his employees and Ramsay's criticism that he shuts down the eatery himself.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Chappy's
programme.desc: The owners of Chappy's, a Cajun-style restaurant, had to move in the wake of Hurricane Katrina. Now in Nashville, they're struggling to find a loyal base of customers.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Hannah and Mason's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits French bistro Hannah and Mason's. Owned by two friends who lack business skills and motivation, the restaurant administers bounced checks to the staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Prohibition Grille
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay helps professional belly dancer-turned-restaurant owner Rishi with her eatery. With little kitchen experience, Rishi lets the head chef control kitchen operations.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Anna Vincenzo's
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Anna Vincenzo's, a family-run eatery in Boca Raton, Florida. He learns that the stubborn owner doesn't welcome change. After his ideas are ignored, Ramsay walks out.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sebastian's
programme.desc: Sebastian's prepares frozen food from a complex menu and the wait staff is more concerned about auditioning for their acting roles than serving meals.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Casa Roma
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Casa Roma, an Italian restaurant in Lancaster, California. Although its bar is packed, Casa Roma's dining area is nearly empty. Most of the problems stem from the inexperienced owners managing a clueless kitchen staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Sante Le Brea
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay travels to LA to inspect Sante La Brea. He discovers a financially strapped owner who isn't respected by his staff. And an incident that occurs in the eatery leads to a police visit.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Lido di Manhattan
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay visits Lido di Manhattan, an Italian joint with an unsightly kitchen and inexperienced owner. He is so horrified that he shuts the place down temporarily.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares: Capri
programme.desc: While visiting the Eagle Rock area of Los Angeles, Chef Ramsay stops by Capri. This Italian restaurant is filthy, serves terrible food and is in disarray all thanks to a lazy set of twins.

programme.title: Snooki & JWOWW
programme.desc: This series follows the dynamic duo as they deal with the craziest adventure of all: motherhood. There's still time for zany fun, though -- including attending a yoga class together, making sushi or preparing for Snooki's wedding.

programme.title: Verdad Oculta: Episodio 41
programme.desc: Después de la caída de un infame narco-líder, el coronel Diana está lista para tomarse un descanso de la policía y trabajar para arreglar su matrimonio. Su jefe, sin embargo, tiene otros planes y le asigna al coronel Diana su mayor misión hasta la fecha: desmantelar "el Clan del Norte" dirigido por los hermanos Zurria y sus aliados oficiales corruptos y funcionarios del gobierno.

programme.title: Escápate A Casa
programme.desc: Un cuento de la mayoría de edad en 1950 y de la perspectiva de una niña que tiene quince años.

programme.title: Agua en la Boca
programme.desc: Es una historia de amor prohibido entre dos jóvenes, hijos de familias rivales. La hermosa Danielle Cassoulet (de descendencia francés) y el aventurero Luca Bellini (de descendencia italiana). El conflicto entre el cassoulet y la familia Bellini es viejo, siendo antes los mejores amigos de la juventud las matriarcas de esas familias hoy no pueden permanecer de pie debido a una disputa amorosa en el pasado en el que Françoise Cassoulet, y la abuela de Dany se peleaban por el amor de un mismo hombre.

programme.title: El Mono
programme.desc: A dos medio hermanas la vida les dará un giro radical luego de evento dramático.

programme.title: El Talisman
programme.desc: Tras perder un rancho en Texas, Camila Nájera y su familia se mudan a Fresno, California. El destino los llevará a ser vecinos del despiadado Gregorio Negrete, dueño del rancho "El Alcatraz". Gregorio ha vivido en guerra con Los Aceves, antiguos dueños de "El Talismán", y su único sueño es poseer ese rancho. Camila se verá envuelta en este juego de ambición y poder, que la lleva a conocer a dos hombres que le cambiarán la vida.

programme.title: Víctimas Del Divorcio
programme.desc: Cuando tres es multitud.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar es un drama épico ambientado en el siglo XVI que relata la historia sobre un matrimonio político de conveniencia entre un emperador mogol, Akbar y una princesa Rajput, Jodha Bai. La trama se centra en cómo éste matrimonio político trae el amor entre ellos en una medida que cambió el destino de la India, así mismo retrata las guerras de ese tiempo junto con las relaciones entre los mogoles y los Rajputs. Gran parte de la historia recrea el funcionamiento de las instituciones icónicas de la época como las reinas, los tribunales, las cortesanas, los ministros y su influencia en la historia de amor de Akbar y Jodha Bai. La serie también destaca cómo el Emperador Mogol Jalaluddin adquiere el título de Akbar del pueblo.

programme.title: Me Caíste Del Cielo
programme.desc: Una tragi-comedia en la que un hombre rescata al dueño de una taquería, quien se encuentra en inminente riesgo

programme.title: Tengo 17 Años
programme.desc: Una joven de 17 años se escapa de su casa y encuentra refugio en la casa de unos desconocidos que le cambiara la vida.

programme.title: Tintanson Cruzoe
programme.desc: Un taxista acusado de robar dinero a los turistas, escapa a una isla donde los hombres son prisioneros del dios Mio Mao.

programme.title: The K2 EP02
programme.desc: Jae-ha becomes a fugitive, and Jang Se-Jun's wife Yoo-jin even uses public power to chase him. He wanted to live quietly, but when people around him are in danger, he can't stand it anymore and fights back. Jang Se-joon's hidden daughter Anna lived in exile in Spain to avoid public attention. And one day, she came back to Korea after 10 years because of a single picture that was taken by chance.

programme.title: The K2 EP03
programme.desc: Yoo-jin tries to trap Je-ha, but on the contrary she becomes a hostage. The mysterious killers chase Jae-ha and the two are under seriously dangerous situation. Meanwhile, Se-jun exploits it politically and Park Kwan-soo, the biggest political opponents of Se-jun, conspires against him. The past of Park Kwan-soo and Je-ha disclosed and the anger towards Park Kwan-soo brings Je-ha out into the world.

programme.title: The K2 EP04
programme.desc: Yoo-jin appears in front of Jae-ha who is in crisis and an alliance is formed between them. Jae-ha goes to work at Yoo-jin's company JSS and receives a new code name, K2. His new task is observing Anna, Yoo-jin's husband and presidential candidate Jang Se-jun's hidden daughter. and the strange cohabitation between Jae-ha and Anna begins.

programme.title: I'M LIVE: S1 E178
programme.desc: Joining us on this week's I'm LIVE are the beloved monkies of the Korean music industry - JANNABI! JANNABI is an old-fashioned Korean word for “monkey,” and this band made their debut in 2014 with the digital single, "Rocket." Since then, they have impressed numerous listeners with their retro-infused music that portrays various stories of the youth, ranging from love to separation to frustration. Last year, the band released their second full-length album, "Legend," and topped all the music charts with the album's lead track "for lovers who hesitate." Before releasing their third full-length album next year, the band dropped a new mini-album just a week ago, and this time as a duo, to nourish listeners' hearts. In this episode, JANNABI performs both their latest tracks and hit songs - "A thought on an autumn night," "Old dog," "Sweet memories," and "Step" from their new album, "JANNABI's Small Pieces 1," as well as "Summer," and "for lovers who hesitate." Tune in to I'm LIVE this week and enjoy a beautiful autumn day with these talented musicians!

programme.title: Alex Velluto - Spurious
programme.desc: Like Rocky Balboa, Alex Velluto is the son of an Italian immigrant and brings the same intensity, will, and drive to the comedy stage. In 2016, Alex was voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly Magazine and is the winner of the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival in Ithaca, NY. Alex is a regular at Wiseguys Comedy Club where he has headlined and worked with some of the biggest names in comedy. He has also “gone the distance” in many competitions and festivals across the country. Alex was a finalist in the the Funniest Person in Utah competition, and The Salt Lake Comedy Festival stand up competition, has performed at the Idaho Laugh Festival, and Finger Lakes Comedy Festival. In addition to his stand-up comedy, Alex is a co-host of the "Happy Valley Podcast", and is renowned for referring to himself in the third person, and is an excellent writer of comedy bios about himself that everybody likes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brad Trackman - Thanks
programme.desc: Brad Trackman is a national touring comedian who has been featured on a number of well-known comedy shows and channels.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Orlando Baxter - Glorified Baby Sitter
programme.desc: Orlando Baxter's fresh perspective and unique relatability makes this former high school teacher a fan favorite all over the world. In 2016, Orlando made his late night TV debut on the Conan show on TBS, and since then he's appeared on the television shows "Comedy Up Late" in Australia, B.E.T.'s "50 Central" and Laff Mobb's Laff Track on Tru TV.

programme.title: Don Barnhart - The Spinal Disintegration of Man
programme.desc: Don’s ability to keep audiences of all ages howling with laughter and coming back for more is what separates him from the average joke teller.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Karen Morgan - Go Dawgs!
programme.desc: A former trial attorney, she moved from the courtroom to comedy after being selected as a Finalist on Nickelodeon TV’s Search for the Funniest Mom in America.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Sid Davis - Baggage Claim
programme.desc: This former airline worker hilariously unloads side-splitting baggage on stage. Sid's humor is fueled with A.D.D., a wavering ego, and a grade school teacher wife who views him as a child left behind.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tony Deyo - Sleep When The Baby Sleeps
programme.desc: Tony Deyo is a stand-up comedian known most notably for his sharp, quick material and near-perfect comedic timing almost certainly gained from his years as a professional symphony musician. New York City’s Village Voice calls him “one of the tightest joke writers in the business.” In 2013, he made his late night television debut on CONAN. Within a year, he had added appearances on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, AXS TV’s Gotham Comedy Live, and Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen. His latest album, Comedy Road Trip, landed on the Billboard Magazine comedy chart and debuted as the #1 selling stand-up album on iTunes. With over 50 stand-up clips available, he has steadily become one of the most prolific comedians on YouTube. He performed at the prestigious HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, was named one of the year's best by the New York Post, and can be heard regularly on SiriusXM Satellite Radio.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Brian Bates - Uber Important
programme.desc: Turning to comedy after twenty years in corporate America, Brian Bates jokes about ubering his hecklers home, meeting women while hiking, and people who dont believe in God but do believe in wrestling.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Johnny Beehner - The Flamingo Special
programme.desc: Johnny Beehner puts on a funny show. He's got everything you want from a comic: He's silly, he’s likeable, and he's fun. With a background in improvisational theater including training at Chicago’s prestigious Second City, as well as the Upright Citizens Brigade in Los Angeles, Johnny brings a unique style to the stage. Beehner made his network television debut in January of 2015 as one of the last comedians to appear on the Late Show with David Letterman. He has made numerous appearances on FOX "Laughs" television show, and regularly appears on the nationally syndicated Bob & Tom Show. His comedy can be heard regularly on XM/ Sirius Satellite radio. Other notable and accomplishments of Johnny's include winning First place in Comcast's 2014 season of "Trial By Laughter," placing third in the 2014 “Laughing Skull Comedy Festival” of Atlanta, and making it to the finals in the 2012 “Great American Comedy Festival”. He was named one of Ricky Gervais' Top 5 picks in the "Just Sayin” stand up contest. Johnny was recently named one of 2015's Top10, "Hot Comics to Watch" by his wife. She says that he would have a shot at the #1 spot if he would “work just a little bit harder”. He's a married man, a new dad, and his current life goal is to win just one argument with his beautiful wife.

programme.title: Jason Hewlett - Father Time
programme.desc: The Award-Winning One-Man Show of Jason Hewlett The Entertainer will have you laughing until it hurts. Comedy, Music, Impressions, and Standing Ovations make Jason the perfect entertainer. His brand of Hilarious G-Rated Entertainment is unlike anything you have ever enjoyed. Over 2,000 shows for more than 1 Million audience members in his incredible career make Jasonís show an event you will remember for years to come.

programme.title: Matt Falk - Un-Lit
programme.desc: Matt Falk was called “effortlessly funny” by the CBC. He’s performed at Just For Laughs, The Hal!fax Comedy Festival and the Winnipeg Comedy Festival. He was recently named one of the “Best of the Fest” at the Burbank Comedy Festival in California.

programme.title: Jeff Allen - I Can Laugh About it Now
programme.desc: Jeff Allen combines clean, hilarious humor like no other comedian working today. Besides performing at corporate functions and fundraisers, he regularly appears on television, radio, and casinos across the country. Consistently making heroes out of meeting planners, Jeff Allen provides world-class comedy.

programme.title: Billy Anderson - America's Sweetheart
programme.desc: Born in Texas and raised in Augusta, Georgia ñ Billy Anderson is stand-up comedian currently living in Seattle, Washington. Heís been seen regionally at SketchFest Seattle, The Washington Comedy Festival, Bumbershoot and was a finalist in the 2016 Seattle International Comedy Competition. Outside of the Northwest, Billy has written for Cracked.Com, performed in SF Sketchfest, LaLaFest Los Angeles, the San Francisco International Comedy Competition and as of 2013 he has performed stand-up comedy in every US state. Billy was recently featured on Audibleís ìSounds Like Americaî hosted by Jackie Kashian and the syndicated program ìLaughsî on Fox television.

programme.desc: Texas. The home of barbecue, The Alamo, and Steve Treviño.

programme.title: Buscando La Comedia
programme.desc: A collection of one-on-one conversations with Spanish comedy royalty and a glimpse into what life is like as.

programme.title: Jeff Dunham: Minding The Monsters

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Pressure Point
programme.desc: Sebastian Dellacourt is leading a double life: he tells his wife that he’s a humble systems analyst. But he’s actually a D-list actor starring in films by the director of Time Chasers and Radical Jack! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - The Value of Teamwork
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this short about a talking dog teaching his young master all about The Value of Teamwork. Be a team player and join Mike, Kevin, and Bill for this hilarious riff!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX - Superargo And The Faceless Giants
programme.desc: Join former MST3K stars Mike, Kevin, and Bill and have a blast with the meandering, low-impact heroics of Superargo and the Faceless Giants! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (former stars of Mystery Science Theater 3000 aka MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Paper and I
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short all about a little boy and his talking paper bag. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill as they fly off to the forests of the American South for Paper and I!

programme.title: RiffTrax Presents: Junior Prom
programme.desc: This movie has it all and then some: romance, political intrigue, studying, rich uncles, big bands, familial strife, journalism, jazz, soda fountains, swing dance, real estate, and a prom! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Bridget and Mary Jo from RiffTrax (formerly of Mystery Science Theater 3000).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - A Day of Thanksgiving
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to this educational short about the true meaning of Thanksgiving. Join Mike, Kevin, and Bill at the table for A Day of Thanksgiving!

programme.title: RiffTrax: Blood Theater
programme.desc: Every time the Blood Theatre has opened for business, someone has died. But this time, the most incompetent theater owner in town has a good feeling about his chances! This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).

programme.title: RIFFTRAX SHORT - Families: Earning And Spending
programme.desc: The stars of MST3K bring their comedic riffing treatment to the educational short Families: Earning And Spending! Join Mike, Kevin and Bill and spend a little well-earned time with Families: Earning and Spending!

programme.title: RIFFTRAX LIVE - Space Mutiny
programme.desc: Space Mutiny! The very title conjures up many memories: tiny cars, writhing spandex-witches, deadly railings. Oh, and we guess there's a mutiny in there somewhere...This feature is a parody and contains the original movie combined with a comedic commentary by Mike, Kevin and Bill from RiffTrax (formerly of MST3K).
